QuestData.Title: The Faceless Ones
QuestData.Description: In my peoples' struggle against the forces of the undead, they dug deeper as they lost ground.$b$bThey inadvertently exposed minions of the Old Gods known only as the Faceless.$b$bIn the end, we could not fight a war on two fronts.$B$BWith your aid, perhaps the Faceless will finally fall.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seer Ixit in Ahn'Kahet wants you to kill Herald Volazj and the three Forgotten Ones that accompany him.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you overcome the faceless ones, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: You have done well, $c.$b$bWith the servants of the Old Gods defeated, the time is upon my people to retake our ancient home.
